title.rendered: Khloe Kardashian: Tristan Thompson CONFESSED to Banging Jordyn Woods! (And It Was All …

content.rendered:
On Tuesday, the celebrity gossip world was stunned by news that Tristan Thompson was caught cheating on Khloe Kardashian with Jordyn Woods, the 21-year-old best friend of Khloe’s little sister Kylie Jenner.

The shocking part wasn’t that Tristan cheated — we’ve come to expect that.

But we expected even Tristan to possess enough self-restraint and common sense to refrain from banging Kylie’s BFF.

Not only is his relationship with Khloe now officially over (finally), Tristan is about to get the death sentence in the court of public opinion.

So perhaps when Tristan confessed to his most recent infidelity, it was part of an effort to rescue some small part of his public image.

Needless to say, it didn’t work.

Take a look:
